nameEntry.part: Consultative Committee on Residential Child Care [and Interim Committee]
Interim Committee on Residential Child Care
Consultative Committee on Residential Child Care
Consultative Committee on Out of Home Care

biogHist.abstract: The Consultative Committee on Residential Child Care (CCRCC) was established by the Premier of Western Australia in 1977 as an Interim committee, as a result of the Committee of Inquiry into Residential Child Care. The CCRCC had a developmental review and evaluation role over out-of-home 'care' practices in WA and reported to the Minister responsible for child welfare.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Boards - Committees - Consultative Committee on Residential Child Care (1976 - 1981)
Committee of Inquiry into Residential Child Care, State of Western Australia (1976)

descriptiveNote.p: The Consultative Committee on Residential Child Care was established as a result of the Committee of Inquiry into Residential Child Care in Western Australia.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Department for Community Welfare, State of Western Australia (1972 - 1985)

descriptiveNote.p: The Consultative Committee on Residential Child Care reviewed and evaluated residential child care facilities that were subsidised by the Department for Community Welfare.

descriptiveNote.p: The Consultative Committee on Residential Child Care reviewed and evaluated residential child care facilities that were subsidised by the Department for Community Development.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: Consultative and advisory committees on residential care for children 1977 to 2003

archref.repository: Dr Debra Rosser, Blair Fox Pty Ltd, unpublished manuscript
archref.unittitle: Consultative and advisory committees on residential care for children 1977 to 2003
archref.abstract: 'Consultative and advisory committees on residential care for children 1977 to 2003' is a copy of an unpublished manuscript prepared by Dr Debra Rosser in 2004. It gives an overview of a number of consultative and advisory committees established to inform the Minister and Departments responsible for child welfare in Western Australia. Committees named in the document are the Interim Committee on Residential Child Care (1977-1980); the Consultative Committee on Residential Child Care (1981-1990); the Consultative Committee on Out of Home Care (1991-1993); the Out of Home Preventative and Alternative Care Planning and Coordination Committee (1994-1998); the Care for Children Advisory Committee (1999-2002); and the Children and Young People in Care Advisory Committee (2003).
